LocalizedStrings.LocalizedString: Sign in with your social account
We are having trouble signing you in. Please try again later.
We can't seem to find your account.
Looks like you used an old password.
Your account has been locked. Contact your support person to unlock it, then try again.
Your account is temporarily locked to prevent unauthorized use. Try again later.
There are too many requests at this moment. Please wait for some time and try again.
Wrong code entered, please try again.
Meld aan met jou sosiale rekening
Ons sukkel om jou aan te meld. Probeer asseblief later weer.
Ons kan nie jou rekening vind nie.
Dit lyk of jy 'n ou wagwoord gebruik het.
Jou rekening is gesluit. Kontak jou admin om dit te ontsluit, en probeer dan weer.
Jou rekening is tydelik gesluit om ongemagtigde gebruik te voorkom. Probeer later weer.
Daar is te veel versoeke op hierdie oomblik. Wag asseblief vir 'n rukkie en probeer dan weer.
Verkeerde kode ingevoer, probeer asseblief weer.
Sign in with your social account
We are having trouble signing you in. Please try again later.
We can't seem to find your account.
Looks like you used an old password.
Your account has been locked. Contact your support person to unlock it, then try again.
Your account is temporarily locked to prevent unauthorized use. Try again later.
There are too many requests at this moment. Please wait for some time and try again.
Wrong code entered, please try again.
Email address that can be used to contact you.
Please enter a valid email address.

8-16 characters, containing 3 out of 4 of the following: Lowercase characters, uppercase characters, digits (0-9), and one or more of the following symbols: @ # $ % ^ & * - _ + = [ ] { } | \ : ' , ? / ` ~ " ( ) ; .

8-16 characters, containing 3 out of 4 of the following: Lowercase characters, uppercase characters, digits (0-9), and one or more of the following symbols: @ # $ % ^ & * - _ + = [ ] { } | \ : ' , ? / ` ~ " ( ) ; .
The password entry fields do not match. Please enter the same password in both fields and try again.
One or more fields are filled out incorrectly. Please check your entries and try again.
An account could not be found for the provided user ID.
Your account has been locked. Contact your support person to unlock it, then try again.
Verification is necessary. Please click Send button.
Verification code has been sent to your inbox. Please copy it to the input box below.
We are having trouble verifying your email address. Please enter a valid email address and try again.
E-mail address verified. You can now continue.
We are having trouble verifying your email address. Please try again.
We are having trouble verifying your email address. Please try again later.
There have been too many requests to verify this email address. Please wait a while, then try again.
That code is expired. Please request a new code.
You've made too many incorrect attempts. Please try again later.
That code is incorrect. Please try again.
There are too many requests at this moment. Please wait for some time and try again.
A user with the specified ID already exists. Please choose a different one.
E-posadres wat gebruik kan word om jou te kontak.
8-16 karakters, wat 3 uit 4 van die volgende bevat: Kleinletters, hoofletters, syfers (0-9) en een of meer van die volgende simbole: @ # $ % ^ & * - _ + = [ ] { } | \ : ' , ? / ` ~ " ( ) ; .
8-16 karakters, wat 3 uit 4 van die volgende bevat: Kleinletters, hoofletters, syfers (0-9) en een of meer van die volgende simbole: @ # $ % ^ & * - _ + = [ ] { } | \ : ' , ? / ` ~ " ( ) ; .
Die wagwoordinvoervelde stem nie ooreen nie. Voer asseblief dieselfde wagwoord in beide velde in en probeer weer.
Een of meer velde is verkeerd ingevul. Gaan asseblief jou inskrywings na en probeer weer.
'n Rekening kon nie gevind word vir die verskafde gebruiker-ID nie.
Jou rekening is gesluit. Kontak jou ondersteuningspersoon om dit te ontsluit, en probeer dan weer.
Verifikasie is nodig. Klik asseblief Stuur knoppie.
Verifikasiekode is na jou inbox gestuur. Kopieer dit asseblief na die invoerkassie hieronder.
Ons sukkel om jou e-posadres te verifieer. Voer asseblief 'n geldige e-posadres in en probeer weer.
E-posadres geverifieer. Jy kan nou voortgaan.
Ons sukkel om jou e-posadres te verifieer. Probeer asseblief weer.
Ons sukkel om jou e-posadres te verifieer. Probeer asseblief weer later.
Daar was te veel versoeke om hierdie e-posadres te verifieer. Wag asseblief 'n rukkie en probeer dan weer.
Daardie kode is verval. Versoek asseblief 'n nuwe kode.
Jy het te veel verkeerde pogings aangewend. Probeer asseblief weer later.
Daardie kode is verkeerd. Probeer asseblief weer.
Daar is te veel versoeke op hierdie oomblik. Wag asseblief vir 'n rukkie en probeer weer.
'n Gebruiker met die gespesifiseerde ID bestaan ​​reeds. Kies asseblief 'n ander een.

You can download the Microsoft Authenticator app or use any other authenticator app of your choice.
Using your app scan this QR code and click "Continue"
Enter the 6-digit verification code generated by the the Authenticator app in the box.
Enter the verification code from your authenticator app​.
Once you've downloaded the Authenticator app, you can use any of the methods below to continue with enrollment.
Download the Microsoft Authenticator using the download links for iOS and Android or use any other authenticator app of your choice.
Jy kan die Microsoft Authenticator-toepassing aflaai of enige ander Authenticator-toepassing van jou keuse gebruik.
Kan jy nie skandeer nie? Probeer hierdie
Deur jou toepassing te gebruik, skandeer hierdie QR-kode en klik "Gaan voort"
Voer die 6-syfer-verifikasiekode in wat deur die die Authenticator-toepassing gegenereer is in die blokkie.
Voer die verifikasiekode vanaf jou verifikasie-toepassing in.
Sodra jy die Authenticator-toepassing afgelaai het, kan jy enige van die metodes hieronder gebruik om voort te gaan met inskrywing.
Laai die Microsoft Authenticator af deur die aflaaiskakels vir iOS en Android te gebruik of gebruik enige ander Authenticator-toepassing van jou keuse.
You can download the Microsoft Authenticator app or use any other authenticator app of your choice.
Using your app scan this QR code and click "Continue"
Enter the 6-digit verification code generated by the the Authenticator app in the box.
Enter the verification code from your authenticator app​.
Once you've downloaded the Authenticator app, you can use any of the methods below to continue with enrollment.
Download the Microsoft Authenticator using the download links for iOS and Android or use any other authenticator app of your choice.
Your password has expired, please change to a new password.
The password entry fields do not match. Please enter the same password in both fields and try again.

Voer 'n nommer hieronder in wat ons kan bel om jou te staaf.

Jy bereik die limiet op die aantal oproeppogings. Probeer binnekort weer.
Jy bereik die limiet op die aantal verifikasiepogings. Probeer binnekort weer.
Die verifikasiekode wat jy ingevoer het stem nie ooreen met ons rekords nie. Probeer asseblief weer, of versoek 'n nuwe kode.
